Object.Description: It's healthy!\nMaxes any class to 8/8 and adds a Backpack.
Use it and simply hit the class you need equipment for! Recommended to be used in your vault.\n\nConsume responsibly!
Opens everything! For testing purposes.
Spawns an object that drops keys and items. For testing purposes.
Teleports the user near the mountains.
Kills 1 Heroes of Oryx.
A ring worn by powerful creators in the goal to observe their brand new creation.
Renders the user invincible for a day through sheer confidence.
Use this item to gain 10 Campaign Points.\n\nSprite Credits: Artauris
A wicked mace constructed by Dr. Terrible to impose the Mad God's will. It stands as one of Oryx's greatest attempts at merging magic and technology.

EffectInfo.name: Summons
EffectInfo.description: Wandering steed, click or hold your Summon Control button to move it.

Object.Description: A standard, lightweight sheath fit for enabling quick draws in a forward dash.
A beautifully crafted shuriken.

EffectInfo.name: Summons
EffectInfo.description: Wandering steed, click or hold your Summon Control button to move it.

Object.Description: Exposure to this ferocious concoction is so intensely lethal that it acts instantaneously. Its deceptively small vial allows for easy use.
A magical lute with multiple modes.

EffectInfo.name: Summons
EffectInfo.description: Wandering steed, click or hold your Summon Control button to move it.

Object.Description: Placing this trinket into an appropriate slot found on Steamworks machines activates their overclock drastically increasing output. The increased speed causes a greater amount of wear on the parts of the machine, usage of this item is only authorized to higher ranking Kogbolds.

Efforts by lower workers of the kogbolds to arm themselves against invaders has resulted in various interesting crudely made armaments. Fashioned from the boiler of a steam generator, this staff projects its scalding vapors towards a target, cooking them alive.

A large sheet of plating intended to be used as a blast shield in explosives testing. When confronted with intruders some of the more cowardly Kogbolds choose to use them to protect themselves while fleeing.

EffectInfo.name: On Ability Use
EffectInfo.description: Gain a 15 point Speed and Defense Boost for 4 seconds.

EffectInfo.name: Overpressure
EffectInfo.description: When the player's movement is affected by a negative condition (Slow, Confused, Paralyzed), the Cower Shield will emit clouds of steam when they shoot. These deal 325-400 damage.

Object.Description: This electrical rod is actually used to remove rust from machine parts through electrolysis. When used on a living or artificial creature however, the shock causes muscles to tense and circuits to go haywire, reducing the assailant's power.

EffectInfo.name: On Use
EffectInfo.description: Produces 3 explosions at the aim point.
The first heals the player and allies, with subsequent bursts dealing decreasing damage over a wider area.

Object.Description: The oldest forms of automatic computing built by the Kogbolds were a far cry from the self improving artificial intelligence of the modern Core designs. Though its computation capabilities are lost to time, the matrix remains conveniently effective at distributing powerful surges of energy.
Of all the tools found on Kogbold excavation bots, none is more versatile than the KI225 Chain Cutter. Useful for cutting through unwanted obstructions ranging anything from stone to flesh.

EffectInfo.name: Rev Up
EffectInfo.description: Gain a 1 point Dexterity Boost on shooting, with a maximum cap of 10 Dexterity from sustained fire.

Object.Description: Early prototype versions of the KI470 Laser pointing device came with no inbuilt limiter on their power output. First batch testing resulted in many schematics cut clean in half, as well as multiple layers of steel wall.
Kogbolds carry these shields around to hide behind. When threatened they release a blast of steam from the front before scampering to safety.

EffectInfo.name: On Ability Use
EffectInfo.description: Gain a 15 point Speed Boost for 4 seconds.

Object.Description: This experimental set of dual blades dared to ask the question â€“ what if both the blades were the big one? Unfortunately, the curve of the second blade caused it to fly back towards the user.
The projectiles of this spellblade can achieve great speed when fired...after they spend a moment to get warmed up.
By welding a massive weight to a chain, you can make a flail so heavy barely anyone can use it. But even if it misses, the impact alone will knock enemies flying.

EffectInfo.name: Seismic Impact
EffectInfo.description: The weapon has a 40% chance to cause an explosion which deal between 60 and 80 damage when fired.

Object.Description: The unique shape of these Tachi mean that when the blades cross over, they pull back in a sweeping motion, slicing to either side of the user.
This holy water dispenser has become corroded and rusty, with the only liquid it produces being a concentrated acid.

EffectInfo.name: Acid Pools
EffectInfo.description: The weapon has a 20% chance to leave a puddle of acid behind when it shoots..
This acid deals 100 damage per second to enemies in contact with it.

Object.Description: This bow fires arrows a little too fast, reducing them to ragged splinters in flight.
Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.
Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.
Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.
Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.
Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.
Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.
Unlocks new items in the Item Forge. Also, one Blueprint can be dismantled for some Forgefire reduction.
No mortal can fire this dreaded bow without resting in between shots. It requires tremendous skill to wield.
Adult male basilisks are apex predators, and at full maturity their tails gain the unique ability to release piercing acid from the tip.
A slow but powerful sword that is a relic of a long forgotten age.
An astronomically heavy katana. It is forged from dark matter.
A medallion infused with the essence of the Factory Control Core.

EffectInfo.description: Obtained by defeating the Factory Control Core in the Kogbold Steamworks
EffectInfo.name: Drop location

Object.Description: A well machined object said to give the Kogbolds their strength.

EffectInfo.description: Use in the forge to upgrade some Untiered Weapons.
EffectInfo.name: Forge

EffectInfo.description: Obtained by defeating the Factory Control Core in the Kogbold Steamworks
EffectInfo.name: Drop location
